Environments.Name: A Name to identify your b2c environment

PolicySettings.MetadatasBlobStorageUrl: The url to the container/folder which contains the SPID IdP edited metadatas
PolicySettings.CustomUiBlobStorageUrl: The url to the contianer/folder which contains the customUI
PolicySettings.AppInsightsKey: The AppInsights key used by custom policies
PolicySettings.CNSSAMLMetadata: The metadata url for the CNS middleware. Used only if you want to use CNS
